channel.title: Unsigned
channel.description:
Every time I try to load a signed java applet, it says:
The code cannot be verified by a trusted source. Code will be treated as unsigned. Name: (Insert applet name here) java.ioEOFFEXCEPTION
It says this on every single signed applet I try to run. How do I fix this?

item.title: Unsigned
item.dc:creator: @Zillionair1 Zillionair1
item.description:
@Zillionair1 wrote:

Every time I try to load a signed java applet, it says:

The code cannot be verified by a trusted source.
Code will be treated as unsigned.
Name: (Insert applet name here)
java.ioEOFFEXCEPTION

It says this on every single signed applet I try to run.
How do I fix this?

Read full topic
